title: Mouse Turbines
alt: It's sad seeing those videos of turbine blade being torn apart in high winds, but it's the only way they can disperse their seeds.
transcript:
[Megan and Beret Guy are walking on grass.]
Beret Guy: Ahh, summer!
Beret Guy: The clouds are big, the bugs are zooming,[Beret Guy stops walking. There are three small trefoil structures and a tiny building on the grass in front of him.]
Beret Guy: and the field mice have put up their little wind turbines.[Beret Guy picks up one of the turbines. Under the turbine there is a wire attached to the ground.]
Megan (off-panel): You mean dandelions?
Beret Guy: No.[Beret Guy holds the turbine in front of him.]
Beret Guy: Make a wish![Beret Guy blows into the turbine blades and makes them spin. The wire transfers electricity towards the ground.]
Puff
⚡ ⚡ ⚡ ⚡
Voice at ground level: Yaaay!
